Package persistance

Class ConfigDDBBDAO

java.lang.Object
persistance.ConfigDDBBDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigDAO
public class ConfigDDBBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigDAO
Class that manages database operations regarding a user's configuration

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      value - Value of the new piano volume (1 = full volume, 0 = silent)
